short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and replace words on a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickReplace is a free browser extension that allows users to easily search for and replace words on any web page. With an intuitive and extremely simple UI, users can quickly find and replace words to improve their browsing experience. This extension is compatible with all major browsers and is perfect for anyone looking to save time and streamline their online activities.
